author: Swati
title: Woman teacher suspended for consuming alcohol and abusing at school in MP
text:
Madhya Pradesh: A woman teacher on Monday created a scene at a government school in Singhana village of Dhar district of Madhya Pradesh. A video of the incident is being widely circulated on the Internet. Following that she was suspended.
The woman can be seen misbehaving with the staffers and others in the video. She consumed alcohol and arrived at the school. She can be seen talking in an inappropriate manner and even threatened the people there.
The Dhar District Collector’s Tribal Welfare Department was quick to respond and ordered her suspension. As per the official order, the date of the incident in mentioned to be on June 23.
The woman teacher used abusive language and had consumed alcohol. She is a primary school teacher and teaches to around 150 students from Class 1 to Class 5.
The Principal and others teachers said such incidents had occurred in the past. Even the students agreed to the misconduct of the teacher.
